results.name: A Community Garden Outside Of Kyiv
A Rat's life: the Cat Conspiracy
破廉恥な女戦士アテナ (中文無碼版)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 320 MB available space

results.name: Monsters and Warriors - Onet Match Connect

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 130 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
